price: “Rabbiin malee waan biraa hin gabbarinaa” jechuun (addaan baafamte). Ani isiniif Isa irraa akeekkachiisaafi gammachiisaadha
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
